title: Bloomberg Markets: TCW's  Rivelle on Fed’s ‘Quixotic Journey’
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: TCW's  Rivelle on Fed’s ‘Quixotic Journey’
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tad Rivelle Chief Investment Officer TCW Discussing signs indicating that investors should be approaching the markets with caution and warns that markets have lost focus on fundamentals. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
